page.title: 15TREES & HEDGEROWS
page.content: We have studied the hedgerows of the area and have found some interesting information.The hedges appear to be at least 600 years old and probably older,we discovered this by counting the number of tree varieties.In this main we found{oak, beech ,hazel , {sycamore,chestnut & elm}.The hedgerows developed over the years because the farmers ploughed their fields & found stones that they didn't want,they piled these to the side.The piles were used to contain grazing animals.Trees grew from piles & hedgerows grew in their shelter.The hedgerows protect some wild life , attracting insects which attract birds & other creatures. In some areas the hedgerows are pulled down to allow more room for machines to work in fields,but not in our area. Individual trees of the species mentioned grow large in the valley.
